contest-event.event-date:
July 20, 1874 D Marske-by-the-Sea Contest
Marske-by-the-Sea Contest 0 Other
marske-by-the-sea-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Marske-by-the-Sea, North Yorkshire Due to the non-appearance of J. Sidney Jones, adjudicator, Herbert Milburn was pressed into service, his band thus disqualified and awarded £12 in compensation.
7 bands entered, 5 appeared
Each played two pieces
Prizes: £20, £15, £10, £5
Nov. 11, 2011, 3:28 p.m. Oct. 25, 2012, 8:10 p.m.
1 Buttershaw Mills (Bradford) Benjamin Denton Jackson Der Freischütz [unknown arranger]
2 Wyke Old Benjamin Denton Jackson Pot Pourri
3 Skelton Lower Edge William Richardson Court Minstrels
4 Guisborough 1st N.Y.V.A. William Winter Lucia di Lammermoor [unknown arranger]
Disqualified Middlesbrough (Milburn's) Herbert Milburn
Withdrawn North Riding Cricketers' Unknown
Withdrawn Saltaire Band Unknown
